The official date for the launch of Firefox 3 is [[June 17]], [[2008]], named "Download Day 2008." Firefox will be aiming to set the record for most software downloads in 24 hours. People can make pledges that say that they will download Firefox 3 at [http://www.spreadfirefox.com/en-US/worldrecord spreadfirefox.com]. As of [[June 17]], [[2008]], about 1.7 million people have pledged to download Firefox 3.<ref>{{cite web | url=http://www.spreadfirefox.com/en-US/worldrecord/ | title=http://www.spreadfirefox.com/en-US/worldrecord/ | date = 2008-06-17 | accessdate = 2008-06-17}}</ref>
+
The official date for the launch of Firefox 3 is [[June 17]], [[2008]], named "Download Day 2008." Firefox will be aiming to set the record for most software downloads in 24 hours. People can make pledges that say that they will download Firefox 3 at [http://www.spreadfirefox.com/en-US/worldrecord spreadfirefox.com]. As of [[June 17]], [[2008]], more than 1.7 million people have pledged to download Firefox 3.<ref>{{cite web | url=http://www.spreadfirefox.com/en-US/worldrecord/ | title=http://www.spreadfirefox.com/en-US/worldrecord/ | date = 2008-06-17 | accessdate = 2008-06-17}}</ref>
Download Day officially starts at 10:00 a.m. [[Pacific Time Zone|PDT]] on June 17.<ref>[http://www.spreadfirefox.com/node/2438 The Official Download Day Time at www.spreadfirefox.com]</ref> With the announced date, the download day is [[June 18]] for timezones greater than GMT +6, which includes half of [[Asia]] and all of [[Oceania]].
Download Day officially starts at 10:00 a.m. [[Pacific Time Zone|PDT]] on June 17.<ref>[http://www.spreadfirefox.com/node/2438 The Official Download Day Time at www.spreadfirefox.com]</ref> With the announced date, the download day is [[June 18]] for timezones greater than GMT +6, which includes half of [[Asia]] and all of [[Oceania]].
